description: Represents a component on the website or mobile app
name: component

description: Represents a configuration that the system will modify at least once
name: configuration

schemaFields.label: Push notification event
schemaFields.name: event
schemaFields.tooltip: The event this subscription is tied to

description: Represents a particular field in a component
name: field

schemaFields.label: type
schemaFields.name: type
schemaFields.tooltip: The type of file that is uploaded

schemaFields.label: URL
schemaFields.name: url
schemaFields.tooltip: This will hold the URL of the file

schemaFields.label: Purpose
schemaFields.name: purpose
schemaFields.tooltip: The purpose of this file upload (profile|banner)

schemaFields.label: Note
schemaFields.name: note
schemaFields.tooltip: The note to attach to this

schemaFields.label: Radius
schemaFields.name: radius
schemaFields.tooltip: The radius for this geofence area

schemaFields.label: Source
schemaFields.name: source
schemaFields.tooltip: Where the OAuth token is provided from

description: Represents a page for the frontend/mobile so we can collect what fields are on that page
name: page

schemaFields.name: onOpenAction
schemaFields.label: On open action
schemaFields.tooltip: Action to perform when clicked (OPEN_APP, DEEP_LINK, URL)

description: Represents a push notification sent to a user
name: pushnotification

description: Represents a users push notification identity
name: pushtoken

schemaFields.name: createdBy
schemaFields.label: Created by
schemaFields.tooltip: The user who created this event

schemaFields.label: Entity type
schemaFields.name: modelType
schemaFields.tooltip: The model type such as post or comment

schemaFields.label: Action
schemaFields.name: action
schemaFields.tooltip: Action such as create, delete, query, update

schemaFields.label: Open to
schemaFields.name: openTo
schemaFields.tooltip: Who can subscribe to this event

schemaFields.label: Body
schemaFields.name: body
schemaFields.tooltip: Body of notification, use {{createdBy.username}} for properties

description: An event that can trigger a push notification
name: subscribableevent

schemaFields.label: External ID
schemaFields.name: externalId
schemaFields.tooltip: Unique ID for user in other system

schemaFields.label: URL
schemaFields.name: url
schemaFields.tooltip: The URL to the user's profile on a third party site

description: Represents a third party account such as login with Facebook
name: thirdpartyaccount

schemaFields.label: Birthdate
schemaFields.name: birthdate
schemaFields.tooltip: We need to verify that you are of age to join our social media group. This is for the safety and onliny protection of minors. Thanks for your cooperation.
schemaFields.tooltipQuestion: Why do we need your birthday?

schemaFields.label: Agreed to Terms of Service
schemaFields.name: agreedToTos
schemaFields.tooltip: If the user has agreed to the terms of service or not

name: verification
description: Validate a users phone/email and keep a record of it
